p: Larval survival rate was significantly influenced by host plant (F 6,63 = 6.496, p < 0.0001, Figure 3). The highest larval survival rate was observed in S. tuberosum (84%) and N. tabacum (84%), followed by S. melongena (76%), S. lycopersicum (66%), P. alkekengi (68%), and D. stramonium (62%), while the lowest larval survival rate was observed in L. barbarum (44%) ( Figure 3).
